Only one problem:  I have previously claimed all unclaimed numbers up 
to # 200.  In fact, I already have an episode 120 in my group of 
episodes.  It is called 'More Hedges'.

Yes, I have temporarily stopped working on my scenarios, but I will 
doubt that anyone will complain.

--- In gladiator@y..., "crayner" <crayner@v...> wrote:
> A new level is available for registered users at
> 
> http://plaza.v-wave.com/moontug/rebels.zip
> 
> This map is called the "Northlands Rebellion."  It is *not* a map 
for a
> super-advanced group.  It is a map for a new team that consists of
> *one* player.
> 
> Begin a new game, hire *one* person on to your team of any type you
> like (your favourite character class, for example), set your level 
to 120
> and try it out.
> 
> Feedback is welcome!  I might write sequels to this plot.
> 
> -Chris/Shayd
